item.description: What is the appeal and/or feasibility of an atheistic church? Is a godless congregation something we want, is it something we can get, and is it something we should work for? It's a topic some of us have touched on during previous gatherings, and is one which I think we should all think about if we are serious in our oft-stated goal of enjoying the same sense of community and shared interests which is by default available to religious believers, but for the most part not available to non-believers.
item.name: Boston Atheists Anti-liturgical Brunch
